name: The Damned
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys, WASD, IJKL, or a joystick can all be used as input schemes.

Description

The Damned is a local multiplayer game, created for the AGDG Microgame Jam. Players are tasked with outliving their opponents, the catch being that everyone is chained together. The premise was inspired by the frantic, competitive multiplayer found in the WarioWare series of games.

Credits

Created by Varun Ramesh

GUI:

Unity GUI Skin - https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/3...
